mvt-project /

      mvt---MVT is a forensic tool to look for signs of infection in smartphone devices

Megvii-BaseDetection /

      YOLOX---YOLOX is a high-performance anchor-free YOLO, exceeding yolov3~v5 with MegEngine, ONNX, TensorRT, ncnn, and OpenVINO supported.

AmnestyTech /

      investigations---Indicators from Amnesty International's investigations

flutter /

      flutter---Flutter makes it easy and fast to build beautiful apps for mobile and beyond.

doocs /

      source-code-hunter---😱 从源码层面，剖析挖掘互联网行业主流技术的底层实现原理，为广大开发者 “提升技术深度” 提供便利。目前开放 Spring 全家桶，Mybatis、Netty、Dubbo 框架，及 Redis、Tomcat 中间件等

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs

jwasham /

      coding-interview-university---A complete computer science study plan to become a software engineer.

microsoft /

      CBL-Mariner---Linux OS for Azure 1P services and edge appliances

nocodb /

      nocodb---🔥 🔥 The Open Source Airtable alternative - Powered by Vue.js 🚀 🚀

tinode /

      chat---Instant messaging platform. Backend in Go. Clients: Swift iOS, Java Android, JS webapp, scriptable command line; chatbots

blueedgetechno /

      windows11---windows 11 in react 💻🌈⚡

CryptoBlades /

      cryptoblades---

ventoy /

      Ventoy---A new bootable USB solution.

topotam /

      PetitPotam---

forem /

      selfhost---Selfhost your Forem Community on your own infrastructure 🎉

LaravelDaily /

      Laravel-Roadmap-Learning-Path---

trekhleb /

      learn-python---📚 Playground and cheatsheet for learning Python. Collection of Python scripts that are split by topics and contain code examples with explanations.

verymeticulous /

      wikAPEdia---A central place for apes to learn about stonks. This is not financial advice.

loong132 /

      autojs-script---autojs脚本程序,用于完成安卓设备上的重复性操作.包含脚本: 1.2021年京东618任务脚本 2.2021年京东燃动夏季活动脚本

Xmader /

      musescore-downloader---Download sheet music (MSCZ, PDF, MusicXML, MIDI, MP3, download individual parts as PDF) from musescore.com for free, no login or Musescore Pro required | 免登录、免 Musescore Pro，免费下载 musescore.com 上的曲谱 | Installation: https://msdl.librescore.org/install.user.js

JuliaLang /

      julia---The Julia Programming Language

zhenghaoz /

      gorse---An open source recommender system service written in Go

capt-meelo /

      Beaconator---A beacon generator using Cobalt Strike and PEzor.

Universidade-Livre /

      ciencia-da-computacao---🎓 Um caminho para a educação autodidata em Ciência da Computação!
